sections.heading: project agencies; sections applicable
sections.text: The provisions of sections 18-2451 to 18-2462 shall apply only to agencies created pursuant to sections 18-2426 to 18-2434 and shall not be construed to create any exceptions to the provisions of section 18-2449.SourceLaws 1981, LB 132, ยง 50.

18-2450.Power project agencies; sections applicable.

The provisions of sections 18-2451 to 18-2462 shall apply only to agencies created pursuant to sections 18-2426 to 18-2434 and shall not be construed to create any exceptions to the provisions of section 18-2449.

SourceLaws 1981, LB 132, ยง 50.
